original_text:
But those who seek to destroy my life
    shall go down into the depths of the earth;
korean_text: 나의 영혼을 찾아 멸하려 하는 그들은 땅 깊은 곳에 들어가며

sentences.original_text: But those who seek to destroy my life
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내 생명을 멸하려 하는 자들은

sentences.original_text: shall go down into the depths of the earth;
